messages.urlHashCopiedToClipboard: A URL fragment for the *{name}* filter is copied to the clipboard. You can add it to the navbar.
messages.confirmRemoveLink: Are you sure you want to remove the *{link}* relationship?
messages.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove the entity type from the system?
messages.linkConflict: Name conflict: link or field with the same name already exists.
messages.beforeSaveCustomScript: A script called every time before an entity is saved. Use for setting calculated fields.
messages.beforeSaveApiScript: A script called on create and update API requests before an entity is saved. Use for custom validation and duplicate checking.

tooltips.duplicateCheckFieldList: Which fields to check when performing checking for duplicates.
tooltips.updateDuplicateCheck: Perform checking for duplicates when updating a record.
tooltips.stars: The ability to star records. Stars can be used by users to bookmark records.
tooltips.statusField: Updates of this field are logged in stream.
tooltips.disabled: Check if you don't need this entity in your system.
tooltips.linkAudited: Creating related record and linking with existing record will be logged in Stream.
tooltips.linkMultipleField: Link Multiple field provides a handy way to edit relations. Don't use it if you can have a large number of related records.
tooltips.linkSelectFilter: A primary filter to apply by default when selecting a record.
tooltips.entityType:
Base Plus - has Activities, History and Tasks panels.

Event - available in Calendar and Activities panel.
tooltips.countDisabled: Total number won't be displayed on the list view. Can decrease loading time when the DB table is big.
